project.name: App Flow
project.description: A web-based platform for visually designing Android app layouts and exporting production-ready Jetpack Compose code.

tasks.title: Set up Git repository and Monorepo Structure
tasks.description: Initialize a new Git repo, add README.md, LICENSE, .gitignore, and establish monorepo structure for web app and backend.
tasks.notes: Use Vercel/Netlify project template. Include codeowners file.

tasks.title: Set up CI/CD (Vercel/Netlify & GitHub Actions)
tasks.description: Configure Vercel/Netlify deployment, GitHub Actions for lint/build/test, and environment variables management.
tasks.notes: Skipping CI/CD for now. Will set up after local app is working. Should auto-deploy on main branch push.

tasks.title: Design Database Schema
tasks.description: Design ERD/data models for users, projects, screens, components, assets, themes, and collaboration.
tasks.notes: Optimize for querying screens/components and permissions.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication (Email/OTP, Google, GitHub)
tasks.description: Implement sign up/login with email/password + OTP, Google OAuth, and GitHub OAuth.
tasks.notes: Use secure token storage; add forgot password flow.

tasks.title: Develop Marketing Website (Landing, Features, Pricing, Blog, Docs, About, Contact)
tasks.description: Build responsive marketing pages with SEO, analytics, and modern design.
tasks.notes: Include a blog engine (e.g., MDX).

tasks.title: Set up User Profile and Account Management
tasks.description: Build profile page with plan management, usage stats, and account settings.
tasks.notes: Allow password/email change and delete account.

tasks.title: Implement App Studio Protected Route
tasks.description: Create protected app route for logged-in users to access layout designer.
tasks.notes: Redirect unauthenticated users to login/signup.

tasks.title: Design UI Component Library (Material 3 Theme)
tasks.description: Develop reusable UI components (buttons, inputs, cards, dialogs, etc.) using Material 3.
tasks.notes: Centralize colors, typography, shapes in theme.

tasks.title: Build Drag-and-Drop Layout Canvas
tasks.description: Create the main canvas for drag-and-drop UI building, including element palette, snapping, guides, and multi-screen management.
tasks.notes: Support multi-screen tabs/panels and undo/redo.

tasks.title: Implement Jetpack Compose Elements Palette
tasks.description: Add basic layouts (Column, Row, Box, Scaffold, ConstraintLayout) and widgets (Text, Button, Image, Card, etc.) to the palette.
tasks.notes: Include Material 3 components.

tasks.title: Add Property and Modifier Editing Panel
tasks.description: Develop panel to edit all parameters and modifiers for each composable, with instant live preview.
tasks.notes: Support all standard Jetpack Compose modifiers.

tasks.title: Implement Device and Orientation Preview
tasks.description: Enable users to preview layouts on various Android devices, screen sizes, and orientations.
tasks.notes: Include presets for Pixel, Samsung, tablet, foldable.

tasks.title: Integrate Asset Search Toolbar (Google Fonts, Icons, Stock Images, Lottie, Icon Packs)
tasks.description: Implement left toolbar for searching/adding Google Fonts, Material Icons, Unsplash/Pexels images, Lottie files, and free icon packs.
tasks.notes: Add preview for assets before adding.

tasks.title: Support Asset Import (SVG, PNG, JPG, etc.)
tasks.description: Enable users to import and use their own images & SVGs in layouts.
tasks.notes: Store files in cloud storage.

tasks.title: Implement Custom Themes Library & Theme Generator
tasks.description: Add custom theme library (1000+ themes), generator for user themes, and export as theme.kt. Gate theme code export for free users.
tasks.notes: Premium lock for exports/copy.

tasks.title: Add Custom Made Composables Library
tasks.description: Provide a library of unique, pre-built composables. Gate code export for free users.
tasks.notes: Add premium lock icon for gated content.

tasks.title: Implement Export & Code Generation (kt file, bundled zip)
tasks.description: Allow users to export full screens with all themes/assets/screens as a bundled zip. Support copy-to-clipboard for code.
tasks.notes: Enforce export limits for free users.

tasks.title: GitHub Integration for Export
tasks.description: Implement export of screens/components/themes directly to user's GitHub repo via OAuth.
tasks.notes: Support repo selection and permissions.

tasks.title: Implement Collaboration (Sharing/View-Only - v1)
tasks.description: Enable project sharing/inviting teammates for view/copy access (no editing in v1).
tasks.notes: Add invite and access control.

tasks.title: Version History (Undo/Redo/Revert)
tasks.description: Implement undo/redo and project version history with revert option.
tasks.notes: Consider storing diffs for efficiency.

tasks.title: Add Templates Library & Asset Library
tasks.description: Curate pre-built screen templates and reusable asset library (icons, images, vectors).
tasks.notes: Enable import to user projects.

tasks.title: Implement Accessibility Checker
tasks.description: Automatic checks for color contrast, font size, touch targets, and accessibility best practices.
tasks.notes: Show warnings in UI.

tasks.title: Build Marketplace/Community Features
tasks.description: Enable sharing/discovery of templates, themes, and composables with moderation tools.
tasks.notes: Add public/private sharing settings.

tasks.title: Add Inline Documentation Links
tasks.description: Provide inline documentation and best practices for Jetpack Compose within the editor.
tasks.notes: Link to official docs and custom guides.

tasks.title: Analytics and Error Tracking
tasks.description: Set up analytics (Plausible/Amplitude/GA) and error tracking for both web and backend.
tasks.notes: Track feature usage, errors, and conversion funnel.

tasks.title: Enforce Usage Limits and Gating (Freemium)
tasks.description: Limit exports to 5 files per month for free users, gate premium features and show upgrade prompts.
tasks.notes: Track and reset limits monthly.

tasks.title: Testing and QA
tasks.description: Develop unit, integration, and E2E tests for all core features and flows.
tasks.notes: Automate with CI; include regression and usability testing.

tasks.title: Documentation and Help Center
tasks.description: Write user guides, FAQs, API docs, and create help center for onboarding/support.
tasks.notes: Use MDX or static site generator for docs.

tasks.title: Deploy MVP to Production
tasks.description: Final production deployment and go-live of App Flow MVP.
tasks.notes: Announce launch in developer communities.

tasks.title: Android Studio Plugin (Teaser Page)
tasks.description: Add teaser/coming soon page for Android Studio plugin integration.
tasks.notes: Collect interest via signup form.
